name: Simple First Person Platformer
description:
THIS GAME IS STILL IN PROGRESS

as of now there are 5 levels

W A S D or arrow keys to move

Space to jump

Get points by completing the levels i made

Your points will save

Points are gained by completing a level

The higher the level the more points you gain for completing it (1 point for level one, 2 Points for level 2, etc)

(once you get to the last level and finish it you are brought back to the start)

Points are shown in the bottom left of the screen (its very small)

If a linux user runs it tell me if it works
